overview: B. Pumper pursues both rap recording and gonzo porn with the same singleminded passion. He casts both one-time-only debutantes and industry sluts in nasty, hip hop-influenced productions flavored with bangin' beats and Pumper's own inimitable flow. Most of his joints feature tailor-made BP rap videos, and each release in his Phattys Rhymes and Dimes series even includes a bonus music disc for the true fans.  This title features Laurence Fishburne's daughter, Montana Fishburne. This is her first hardcore sex scene (the one she wanted everyone to see first). There is no comparison to the other scenes that are being offered. This is filthier then any little 19 year old daughter of a famous movie star should have ever thought of doing.
title: Phattys Rhymes and Dimes 14
